page.title: 02 HOUSING
page.content: Housing in and around Ellesmere Port has changed radically during the last 30 years. There has been{little {high rise development,}but large housing estates, both privately and council owned have been built.The most common and popular form of housing is {Semi-detatched property,}in line with the trend of{lower density}housing. Some estates are designed with a theme running through the main plan allowing minor variations to generate individuality. In recent years this individuality has been achieved with various styles and types of houses on the same estate. Many{council tenants {have bought their house and made {improvements. The sheltered form of accommodation (warden assisted accommodation) is the housing of the future as the number of old people increase.
